item.title: Debouncing in Arduino: Why Buttons Bounce and How to Fix It
item.description: Learn why a simple button press can cause multiple signals in Arduino. This chapter explains the physics behind switch bounce, how it affects digital inputs, and the practical debouncing techniques used in real electronics.
